ratings.comment: My goat. The only problem I have is that I wanted to take more philosophy classes after his but dint like the ones. he does such a good job at making really weird and difficult arguments easy to understand. Mad friends in his class and wed talk about class at lunch everyday after class

He breaks down complicated arguments and texts in a way that anybody can understand. The course is structured in a way where he helps you learn all of the foundations so you can think about the topics Hes really relatable and you definitely want to talk to him in office hours also. Love the cat content

Casey's lectures are entertaining and valuable. He is very lenient with absences if you let him know in advance and his lectures cover exactly what he asks on exams. One of the best professors I've had

The best. super chill about everything. generally a very interesting class. attendance isnt mandatory but helps answer questions in exams. there were two midterms and a final. all of them were take home and final paper was super short which helped me focus on other subs.

Casey is the embodiment of how every great professor should be. He cares a lot about both the students and what he teaches, he's charismatic, and his class is extremely engaging and fun. You'll never want to skip a lecture because the class is just that interesting, and Casey is an amazing lecturer. Highly recommend any class with him!

Lectures were very engaging and fun. Not a lot of reading or assignments outside of class. There were weekly discussion posts and discussion section was mandatory, but that was about it. Would highly recommend.

Casey is the best professor I have had, and he will most likely stay the best. He is super engaging, funny, and a great lecturer.  If you want to take a fun class with a professor that makes things easy for you take his class. All the exams were take home open notes, and were helpful to connect all the ideas from lecture.
The best class i could've taken he is so nice and this class was so chill. The professor is also so funny and makes class entertaining.

Casey is, in all likelyhood, the greatest professor you will have in college. Super fun and chill guy, often stays after class to answer any questions students may have. Exams are all take home and participation is not mandatory, but lectures are super engaging and funny so it's worth going.

Super chill. Greater Lecturer, although lectures weren't mandatory they were engaging and helped with the exams. All exams were take home, open note. Great explanations and discussions of philosophical topics.
Very chill. Very cute. Very nice.

Absolute chiller of a professor. Light workload and straightforward readings. All exams were take-home and open-note. I don't think attendance was mandatory, but the lectures helped with some of the topics.

Casey was a great professor who was super chill and wanted to make sure students didn't feel stressed about material or workload. Discussions were super chill, and attendance was encouraged, but I don't think it was mandatory. The finals are take home and you get a week to complete them. Fun class, and interesting material. Would recommend.
